title: In the Heart of the Wind
description: An Enemy's Revenge -- Jamie Malone has known a lifetime of physical and mental abuse and betrayal, but at last he has found love and acceptance in rural Iowa. When he is kidnapped from his home one bitterly cold winter night, the friends he has gained will rally to his defense. Forming a tight bond of protection around Jamie's grieving wife, Jamie's protectors will set into motion an intricate plan to rescue him.An edge of your seat thriller that delves into the intricacies of hatred, vengeance and redemption. A hard-hitting psychological drama guaranteed to keep you turning the pages until the wee hours of the morning.A riveting tale that puts a new face on evil. It is an astounding story of love and hate, good and evil that will satisfy the most demanding thriller fan. With excellent characterization and fast-paced action culminating in one helluva surprise ending, you'll be talking about this novel long after you've set aside!
author: Charlotte Boyett-Compo
